list_definition.definition: an instrument for measuring time, but not worn on the wrist like a watch

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: an alarm clock (= a clock with a ringing device for waking one up in the morning).

list_definition.definition: an instrument for measuring speed of a vehicle or distance travelled/traveled by a vehicle

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: My car has 120,000 miles on the clock.

list_definition.definition: to register (a time) on a stopwatch etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: In the Men’s 200m, he clocked a record breaking 21.18 seconds.
